LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Gunlink.label: Night Vision Goggles
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_Gunlink.description: An auxiliary aiming device for night combat, which can be worn together with a helmet.
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StealthMask.label: Stealth Mask
LanguageData.DMS_Apparel_StealthMask.description: A piece of fabric which covers the wearer's face.
